resources.string: System Android error caused by using Flipper BLE-remote mode
To fix it, try the following solutions:
Turn your phone’s Bluetooth off and then back on
Unpair your Flipper with the phone:
Go to the phone’s Bluetooth Settings and remove your Flipper from paired devices
Go on your Flipper to: Settings→Bluetooth→press Forget All Paired Devices
Reboot your phone and reconnect Flipper
